# ICMA Sept 18 2024
```{r}
glimpse(ChickWeight)
```


```{r}
chick_clean <- ChickWeight %>% ## assigning to a new object "chick_clean"
  select(chick_id = Chick, 
         diet = Diet,
         age_days = Time, 
         weight_gm = weight)  ## renaming & re-ordering while keeping
```

```{r}
summary_table <- ChickWeight %>%
  filter(Time == 20) %>%
  mutate(weight_lbs = weight / 453.6) %>%
  group_by(Diet) %>%
  summarise(
    num_chicks = n_distinct(Chick),
    avg_weight_grams = mean(weight),
    avg_weight_pounds = mean(weight_lbs)
  )


```

# ICMA Sept 23 2024

```{r}
head(billboard)
```
```{r}
billboard_long <- billboard %>%
  pivot_longer(cols = starts_with("wk"),
               names_to = "week", 
               values_to = "position",
               names_prefix = "wk",
               values_drop_na = TRUE)
  print(billboard_long)
  dim(billboard_long)
```
```{r}
billboard_long %>% 
  pivot_wider(names_from = "week",
              values_from = "position")
```
```{r}
billboard_sep <- billboard %>% 
  separate(col = date.entered,
           into = c("year","month","day"))
```


```{r}
billboard_sep %>% 
  unite(col = "full_date",
        c(year,month,day),
           ) %>%
  select(full_date)
```
# ICMA Sept 25 2024

```{r}
ChickWeight %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = weight,
             x = Time,
             color = Diet)) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.5) + 
  geom_smooth(se = FALSE) + 
  theme_classic() + 
  facet_grid(~Diet) + 
  labs(y = "weight in grams",
       x = "days since birth",
       title = "Weight Over Time Across Diets")
```

```{r}
#ggsave("chick_weightovertime.png",
 #      width = 9,
  #     height = 8)
```

```{r}
ChickWeight %>%
  ggplot(aes(y = weight,
             x = Time,
             color = Diet)) +
  geom_boxplot(alpha = 0.5) + 
  geom_smooth(se = TRUE) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  
  facet_grid(~Diet) + 
  
  labs(y = "weight in grams",
       x = "days since birth",
       title = "Weight Over Time Across Diets")
```

# ICMA Oct 9 2024

```{r}
my_number <- 12

```
 
```{r}
age_data <- tribble(
                    ~ id, ~ age,
                    1, 8,
                    2, 10,
                    3, 8,
                    5, 9
            )

gender_data <- tribble(
                    ~ id, ~ gender,
                    1, "f",
                    2, "m",
                    3, "nb",
                    4, "m",
                    6, "f"
            )


gender_data_BADID <- tribble(
                    ~ id_x, ~ gender,
                    1, "f",
                    2, "m",
                    3, "nb",
                    4, "m",
                    6, "f"
            )
```
 
```{r}
age_data

```
 
```{r}
gender_data

```
```{r}
full_join(age_data, gender_data)

```
```{r}
full_join(gender_data_BADID, age_data, by = join_by(id_x == id))

```
```{r}
full_join(age_data, gender_data_BADID, by = join_by(id == id_x))

```
 
```{r}
right_join(age_data, gender_data)

```
```{r}
left_join(age_data, gender_data)

```
```{r}
inner_join(age_data, gender_data)

```
